name: The Uipin Realms (WIP) v0.1.1
description:
Enter the Uipin Realms to save the King!

The king is dying after an evil curse was put on him in battle. The only way to save the benevolent king is to venture across the continent and steal the very same staff that caused the king's affliction! On your way, you will fight monsters, raid dungeons, explore towns and build an army.

The Uipin Realms is a Interactive Fiction RPG made in Twine. Thanks to Tom Prante for the cover art, used under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 License. This game will be constantly updated as I add more and more, so check back every so often!

Please leave any errors you get or suggestions in the comments!
